SELECT c.course_no courseNo , c.course_name courseName , u.user_name professorName , c.course_capacity courseCapacity
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM enrollment e WHERE e.course_no = c.course_no AND e.enrollment_status = 0) currentCount
, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM enrollment e WHERE e.course_no = c.course_no AND e.enrollment_status = 0) >= c.course_capacity THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isFull , c.createdate AS createDate
FROM tb_course c LEFT JOIN tb_sysuser u ON c.professor_user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY c.course_no DESC
